name: Dirt and Crates Thing
description:
I tried to make something Boulder Dash-inspired for TweetTweetJam 3. 

This game was made in Puzzlescript and exported as an html. Check out the source here (560 characters exactly): https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=78c488c6f957718344480f0a7352cff2

Contains 6 levels.
